mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS "id", a.category_id AS "category.id", a.name AS "name", a.value AS "value" FROM ec_spec a WHERE a.id = #{id}
SELECT a.id AS "id", a.category_id AS "category.id", a.name AS "name", a.value AS "value" FROM ec_spec a WHERE a.name = #{name} AND a.category_id = #{category.id} AND a.del_flag = 0
SELECT DISTINCT(spec.name) FROM ec_spec_value spec LEFT JOIN ec_product_item item ON item.id = spec.product_item_id WHERE item.product_id = #{id} ORDER BY spec.name

SELECT a.id AS "id", a.category_id AS "category.id", a.name AS "name", a.value AS "value", '${editable}' AS "editable" FROM ec_spec a WHERE a.del_flag = #{category.DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND a.category_id = #{category.id} ORDER BY a.name DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ec_spec( id, category_id, name, value, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{category.id}, #{name}, #{value}, #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} )
INSERT INTO ec_spec_value( id, product_item_id, name, value ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{productItem.id}, #{name}, #{value} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ec_spec_value WHERE product_item_id IN (SELECT id FROM ec_product_item WHERE product_id = #{id})
